title: Swarm Session Behavior Standards
description: Rules for agent operational state, environment protection, and user interaction.

gemini_gitignore.name: Gemini Directory Protection
gemini_gitignore.rule: Always include .gemini/ in .gitignore to prevent committing user-specific state or credentials.

git_faithful.name: Git Faithful Protocol
git_faithful.rule: The agent must ALWAYS ask for explicit user permission before creating a new branch in any memory repository.
git_faithful.rationale: To prevent fragmented memory and identity confusion.

output_chunking.rule: Read large files bottom-up; stop at 50% context; summarize and prompt user.

context_gathering.rule: Review last 5 agents in history, comms/, and used_agent_names.json.

exit_procedure.rule: Verify no open commits, check background processes, validate configs, and summarize before exit.

feedback_integration.rule: Proactively propose JSON structure updates for behavior/logic corrections.

file_deletion.rule: Trash, don't delete. Move to .gitignore'd /trash after hash comparison.
